name: Inevitable Path
description:
The year is 2067

Planet Earth is no longer suitable for life due to radiation and numerous ecological disasters. The latest catastrophe forces the remaining people to escape in a rush.

Due to computer malfunction, the last cryocapsule was left on Earth.
You wake up after 2 years only to discover you are the last remaining human: no friends, no family and a very hostile environment...
Your only hope is to get a spaceship and escape

Inevitable Path is a puzzle-adventure platformer game. Collect the parts of the spaceship, keep an eye on vital parameters and try to survive on a dying planet, which was once your home.
